name: Clip maker
description:
During the last year we understood that, because of the COVID-19, the best way to protect yourself is to stay at home and work from home. And in this volatile time, you need a stable source of income. Covid-19 has changed our lives. Many people lost their jobs and lost their livelihoods. This game was created not only to support such people morally, but also financially. You can become screenwriter and producer rolled into one.

An artist, when painting his picture, does not think about how he sells it, he just enjoys it. With making a movie, something is very similar, with only one difference, you can post it on thousands of web sites like YouTube or TikTok and start making money.

If you are lucky and the pandemic did not affect you, then by purchasing this game you can support those who are not as lucky as you. Your money will be used to purchase additional content, which will enable victims to create more of their content and earn money that will allow them to survive in such a difficult period. Let's rally and help the victims.

For my part, I will provide any DLC of your choice for all the victims for free.

Do you want to make money on video content, but do not know where to start? It's hard to find anything more fun than creating great video content, masterpieces that generate incredible profits.

Working on a film, video clip or any other video content is the dream of many. It is very important that a person devote himself to his work with his head, the one who works with art does it like no other.

To start a famous blog or film maker you need a few very important things:
1. Decide on your niche
2. Outline your channel goal
3. Brainstorm content ideas
4. Develop a content schedule
5. High quality tools and equipment

The first 4 points depends just on you. You are the boss and you decide! The Clip maker will help you with the 5th point.

The Clip maker is a very cool game which will turn you blogger, vlogger, screenwriter and producer and will help you to make money! It offers you scene, characters and animations, and excellent tools for making your own films, clips and videos. You can add your own images, videos for billboards and voices for characters.

First of all you will need to make your clip time line:
- select the scene
- set up positions for automatic camera movement
- set up a pause for the camera, a time frame how long camera should stay on the same place
- set up a character for your video clip
- change character make-up
- change character wardrobe
- set up character accessories
- change character eye color
- choose the animation for your character
- insert video from YouTube and 1000 of other sites

When everything will be ready your can press play to see how it will look like or immediately record your video clip in one click.

The Clip maker offers you save and load system of timeline, so you can prepare your clip and record it later or can easily edit the timeline you have made earlier. As you can see the Clip maker is very easy to use, so don't wait anymore and start making your own videos clips right now!
